Title: The Way We Weren't
Plot: Jenna and Matty's relationship is heating up in private, but in public she's still his secret. Will a party at Lissa's be their first PDA, or will an unexpected hot-tub visitor ruin everything?
ParentalRatingReason: M Sex scenes and offensive language
GuestStars: Greer Grammer, Janelle Velasquez, Shanica Knowles
